Articles.Content:
Just started a new game in Sandbox mode. The only mod I'm using is EVE. I just noticed that all of the Kerbodyne stuff is missing!

Kerbodyne doesn't show up as an option when filtering by manufacturer. 

I'm assuming that I'm just doing something wrong here... Is there some sort of filtering going on other than the advanced mode filtering? 

I'm using Windows 32-bit; OS is Windows 7.
Check that the NASAmission folder is present in the Gamedata folder. Chances are you deleted it accidentally.

> 
> Check that the NASAmission folder is present in the Gamedata folder. Chances are you deleted it accidentally.

Ohhh... I bet that is it! I did delete some other mods. I'll check when I get home tonight. Thanks!
That was it. Good thing I kept the folders! Thanks for your help.
